verses.verse: The wise among women builds her house, but she of foolishness pulls it down with her own hands.
One walking in his uprightness fears Jehovah, but one being perverse in his ways despises Him.
A rod of pride is in the mouth of a foolish one, but the lips of the wise ones shall keep them.
The manger is clean where there are no cattle, but much increase is by the strength of an ox.
A faithful witness will not lie, but a false witness breathes lies.
A scorner seeks wisdom, but finds it not, yet knowledge is swift to the discerning.
Go from before a foolish man, or you will not know the lips of knowledge.
The wisdom of the shrewd one is to understand his way, but the folly of fools is deceit.
Foolish ones laugh at guilt offering, but favor is among the upright ones.
The heart knows the bitterness of its soul, and a stranger does not share in its joy.
The house of the wicked ones shall be laid waste, but the tent of the upright ones will flourish.
There is a way that seems right to a man, but the end of it is the way of death.
Even in laughter pain is in the heart and in its end that joy is grief.
One backsliding in heart shall be filled with his own ways, but a good man from himself.
One of simplicity believes every word, but the prudent one considers his step.
The wise ones fear and turn from evil, but the fool passes over and is bold.
He who is short of temper acts foolishly; and a man of evil plots is hated.
Ones of simplicity inherit foolishness, but the prudent ones are encircled with knowledge.
The evil ones will bow before the good ones; yea, the wicked ones at the gates of the just one.
The one lacking is hated even by his own neighbor, but lovers of a rich one are many .
He who despises his neighbor sins, but he who favors the humble one, how happy is he!
Devisers of evil go astray? But mercy and truth follow one devising good.
In all pain there is profit, but the word of the lips tends only to poverty.
The crown of the wise ones is their riches; the folly of fools is their foolishness. .
A true witness delivers souls, but a deceitful witness breathes lies.
In the fear of Jehovah is strong trust, and His sons shall have a refuge.
The fear of Jehovah is a fountain of life, to turn aside from snares of death.
In the multitude of people is the king's glory, but in the lack of people is the ruin of a ruler.
One long to anger is of great understanding, but he who is short of spirit exalts folly.
A heart of healing is the life of the flesh, but jealousy is the rottenness of the bones.
One oppressing the poor one curses his Maker, but one honoring Him favors the needy one.
The wicked one is thrust out in his evil, but the righteous one seeks refuge in his death.
Wisdom rests in the heart of one understanding, but amidst fools the lack of it is made known.
Righteousness exalts a nation, but sin is a shame to any people
The king's favor is toward a servant who acts wisely, but his wrath underlies one causing shame.
